value:
It's been a while since I've seen
Teach with that hair color.
Makes me feel like a kid again.

After seeing him fight up close, I get
why they call Dimitri the Tempest
King. He really is like a windstorm.

Nice work on patrol. Diligence like
yours is hard to come by. I can see
why your allies rely on you.

Each of us is weak on our own. Our
strength comes from reaching out
and opening our hearts to each other.

I hope someday to live in a world that
cherishes differences in race and
belief. Everyone's valuable.

So you're $Nu.$k$pYou seem about as sharp and capable
as $Nf said.

History's written by the victors.
That's just a fact.

Can't afford to dwell on hard feelings.
This is war, after all.

Looks like I slipped up! I'll make up
the slack next time.

Thanks. You won't regret this choice,
I promise.

I'm Claude von Riegan. As King of
Almyra, I forged peace with Fódlan.
Happy to do the same with you.

There you are. I've got a request
for you, and I'll give it to you
straight—it's a big one.$k$pAfter we've won peace for Askr,
what would you say about coming
with me back to Almyra?$k$pI know it's a lot to ask, and I don't
even know how we'd manage to get
you there right now...$k$pBut I've come to value your strength,
and if you're willing, I'm sure we'll
find a way when the time comes.$k$pFor now, just give it some thought.
With you by my side, there's no
telling what we could accomplish.
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
This is it!
Let's finish this!
Another successful scheme!
Take your final bow!
Sorry, but...it's up to you now.
Hm...
This is traditional Almyran wyvern rider garb. Looks pretty neat, huh?
Hey now, there are better ways to get my attention. I'm not some kid anymore, you know.
There are so many people here from all walks of life working together... It's pretty much my ideal spot!
Fódlan isn't going to change itself. Sometimes it takes an outsider to make things happen.
I want to see Fódlan welcome a new dawn, and I hope to have my friends there by my side...
It may not be what I had hoped for... But it's time to move forward, right?
There's a lot I could learn from you. I could use some of your tactics back in Fódlan.
At the ready.
Let's hear it.
On it!
